paper.title: Challenges of Measuring Revenue, Margin and Yield Optimization in Container Shipping
paper.abstract: We present in this paper some initial ideas of Revenue and Yield Management in the container shipping industry, namely a regression study of the behavior of the currently used indicator for measuring pricing and revenue performance in a leading shipping line. We consider the properties of the indicator used and discuss options of developing a better indicators of revenue or yield optimization, being either revenue or yield per available unit. At the end we also formulate implications for a future research work to be done on development of relevant measures for the industry.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要讨论的是集装箱航运行业中的收入和收益管理，以及如何开发更好的指标来衡量定价和收入表现。虽然涉及优化和回归分析，但并未明确指出其在衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理等金融领域的应用。
